Name: Grassy Terrain
Effect: Target Battlefield. Add 1 Extra Damage Dice to all Physical & Special Grass-Type Moves. Everyone on the User's side of the Field heals 1 HP at the end of each Round. Spend 1 Will Point to activate. Duration 4 Rounds.
Description: The Pok√©mon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.
